mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Tarr, Campbell to Pierpont, Francis Harrison
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Tarr, Campbell
mdRecord.dcterms:description: FH Pierpoint [Francis H. Pierpont], Wheeling, Va Mch 28 1862. By Telegraph from Washington 28 1862. Send my cancelled check to Connelly for thirty nine hundred dollars Campbell Tarr 11 w 3P&p5col [page 2] Campbell Tarr Washinton D.C. March 28 1862.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Tarr, Campbell
Washington, D.C.
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Pierpont, Francis Harrison
